title: Fellatio
summary: Fellatio (also known as fellation,[1] and in slang as blowjob, BJ, giving head, or sucking off)[2] is an oral sex act involving a person stimulating the penis of another person by using the mouth, throat, or both.[3][4] Oral stimulation of the scrotum may also be termed fellatio,[5][6] or colloquially as teabagging.[7] If fellatio is performed on oneself, the act is called autofellatio.
